post.author: bullet
post.body:
the common -> ladder texture is the special material. You make your ladder or climbable surface (like if you want to be able to up a mossy wall). Then you make a brush with common -> ladder on it, that is the size of your ladder. Line the two up, and voila, whatever surface has that ladder material on it will be climbable.

You might get stuck at the top of the ladder, though. If you do and just sort of bounce up and down, then take the clipper tool and cut the corner off at the top so it's an easier slope for the player to get up.

post.body: You create your ladder ... with normal textures ..then you make a brush the size of your ladder and then cover your ladder with it ..this brush you give the ladder texture.
